main event: One trail of light, having the appearance of trailing a visible flame, was observed from view after being observed for approximately 2 minutes.
interesting points: The trail of light and duration of sighting suggest a phenomenon as astronomical.
The report indicates that the sighting was likely a balloon or aircraft.
The sighting occurred in Sonora, California on October 22, 1955.
The sighting was reported by a civilian observer from the Ground Observer Corps.
The report includes a brief summary of the sighting but does not contain any photographs.
photographs: Yes, but not included in the report
